extensionDescription.message: Collect data locally (files, webpages, etc.), store and search locally, and use local AI + your questions + your local data to provide smart analysis and answers, ensuring data security and improving work efficiency

extensionName.message: BeCurator: Privacy-Focused AI Assistant With Your Data

search_placeholder.message: Search something based on the resource...

problem_document.message: The text of this document too less, may be problem

resource_name_placeholder.message: A descriptive name for the resource

web_name_placeholder.message: A descriptive name for the web

document_building_tip.message: Document is building, please don't close App before finish

click_drag_file_tip.message: Click or drag file to this area

operation_data_safe_tip.message: All the data and operation only in your local device

web_url_placeholder.message: The web url you want to crawl

delete_confirm.message: Are you sure to delete these items

wait_document_build_warning.message: Please wait for the document builded

llm_desc.message: LLM is a technology that can understand and generate text, and the quality of understanding and generation may vary across different models

download_model_again_wanning.message: A model is downloading. Please wait a moment

llm_loading_warning.message: LLM model is loading, please wait a moment

BeCurator_desc.message: is a local knowledge management tool focused on data security. It supports the local collection of various types of data (such as files, web pages, etc.), and efficiently manages them through local storage and intelligent search features. Leveraging local AI technology, BeCurator combines your queries with local data to provide intelligent analysis and accurate answers, ensuring data security while significantly boosting work efficiency.

vector_search_technology.message: By using vector search technology, you can accurately locate the information you need

data_and_ai_computation.message: Data and AI computation are performed solely on your computer, without involving the internet, protecting your privacy and data security

ai_driven_deep_analysis.message: AI-driven deep analysis transforms fragmented knowledge into insights.

download_becurator_from_google_play.message: Download BeCurator from Google Web Store

choose_appropriate_model.message: Choose the appropriate model. Note that the larger the model, the more memory it consumes if you choose Local model. Based on testing, the 3B model meets basic requirements

download_model_tip.message: The model is by default downloaded from Hugging Face. If the internet speed is limited, you can email the author to download the model from other sources and upload it locally

upload_documents_and_links.message: Upload Documents or Setup Web Links.This step will involve BeCurator building text vectors, which can be time-consuming. Reference data: With a 3060Ti GPU, it takes approximately 2 hours to process 1680 chapters of a novel.

integrate_third_party_models.message: Integrate third-party large model invocation capabilities

meet_user_needs_for_email_analysis_and_s.message: Meet the needs of users who require email analysis and search

integrate_third_party_knowledge_base_dat.message: Integrate third-party knowledge base data retrieval, such as Notion

support_table_data_analysis.message: Support various types of table data analysis

author_email_feedback.message: Author (Yoan) email, feel free to provide feedback or issues (＞﹏＜)

one_stop_knowledge_collection_local_stor.message: One-stop knowledge collection, local storage, local AI computation, and intelligent search, transforming your knowledge into an instantly accessible personal intelligent assistant

browser_does_not_support_webgpu.message: × Your browser does not support WebGPU, it is recommended to upgrade Chrome browser

becurator_working_principle_description.message: BeCurator is based on semantic and keyword matching technology. When you input a query, BeCurator intelligently analyzes your query and retrieves the most relevant information from your knowledge base.

adjust_query_for_better_results.message: If the initial search results are unsatisfactory, try adjusting your query or regenerate the answer

use_precise_keywords_or_synonyms.message: Use more precise keywords or related synonyms, and avoid overly broad or vague expressions

try_different_phrases_or_synonyms_if_nee.message: If necessary, try using different expressions or synonyms

acknowledgment_to_danswer_team.message: Many of BeCurator's ideas and architectural designs come from Danswer. Thanks to the Danswer team for their open-source spirit

local_cloud_desc.message: Cloud means it will request third part service to get LLM support(Result Better). Local means it will only use your device to get LLM support(Strong Privacy).
